NK015(ba)012:1: lha rtog gnyis med du bsnyen pa dang /
NK015(ba)012:2: mnyam rdzogs kyi bsnyen pa gnyis las /
NK015(ba)012:7: gtso bo rdo rje mi bskyod pa bsgom bsnyen grub nas /
NK015(ba)012:8: rnam snang dbus su bsgom zhing /
NK015(ba)012:9: mi bskyod pa rnam snang gi gdan la sgoms te bsnyen /
NK015(ba)012:10: de bzhin yid chos gnyis rdzogs par 'gres /
NK015(ba)012:11: thub drug man rang rang der sgoms te bsnyen pa'o //
NK015(ba)012:13: rang gi rtog pa gang yin pa de lha de
NK015(ba)012:14: nyid du gsal bzhin par bsla ba las go 'pho
NK015(ba)012:15: mi dgos / rnam shes nam mkha' sogs kyis re
NK015(ba)012:16: re nas dzapa bzla ba dmigs pa gang la'ang 'dra
NK015(ba)012:17: mi dgos / / gnyis pa mnyam rdzogs kyi bsnyen pa la /
NK015(ba)012:19: mnyam rdzogs chen po gnyis kyi /
NK015(ba)012:21: rang gi thugs ka'i sngags 'khor las sngags 'bru re re nas chad g.yas bskor du yar brgyud /
NK015(ba)012:22: rang gi shangs khung g.yas pa nas /
NK015(ba)012:23: yum gyi shangs khung g.yon nas brgyud /
NK015(ba)012:24: thugs ka'i sngags 'khor rgyab nas g.yon bskor du 'khod /
NK015(ba)012:25: yum gyi sngags 'khor las sngar ltar chad pa /
NK015(ba)012:26: yum gyi shangs khung g.yas pa nas /
NK015(ba)012:27: rang gi shangs khung g.yon du zhugs /
NK015(ba)012:28: thugs ka'i sngags 'khor rgyab nas g.yas bskor du 'khor ba dmigs te /
NK015(ba)012:29: yab yum bsnyen pa sbrel te bzla ba yid chos gnyis kyi bar du 'gres so //
NK015(ba)012:30: thub drug rang rang gi thugs kar bskor /
NK015(ba)012:33: / 'di ni nye bsnyen gyi skabs su mngon /
NK015(ba)012:35: bsnyen bya'i lha gang yin gyi bar du sngags 'khor bskor ba dang 'dam kha can no //
NK015(ba)012:36: gnyis pa mnyam rdzogs chen po ni /
NK015(ba)012:37: dkyil 'khor gyi lha yab thams cad rdor sems mi bskyod par bsdu /
NK015(ba)012:38: yum thams cad rdo rje dbyings phyugs mar bsdu /
NK015(ba)012:41: ye shes pa mdun mkhar dkyil 'khor phye la /
NK015(ba)012:42: de'i bar du sngags 'khor bskor la 'od zer spro bsdus don gnyis bya ba /
NK015(ba)012:43: sgrub pa'i skabs su mngon no /
NK015(ba)012:45: / 'di dag gi skabs bzlas pa'i stong tshig bya ba /
NK015(ba)012:48: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /
NK015(ba)012:49: ye shes rgya mtsho rab zab thugs //
NK015(ba)012:51: nor bu rin chen yon tan mdzod //
NK015(ba)012:52: rdo rje'i yid la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK015(ba)012:55: bde bar gshegs pa sogs kyis dam baca'o //
NK015(ba)012:56: gtso bo la las rung tsam 'bum phrag bzhi'i ma mthar bzung bas /
NK015(ba)012:57: gzhan phyed cha'i rim pas grangs bzung ba'o //
NK015(ba)012:58: zin bris btu ba po bi dza'i ming can no //
